title: Luchita Hurtado Will Be Reborn
description:
In her late 90’s, Venezuelan artist Luchita Hurtado attained the kind of art world ‘rock stardom’ that eluded her most of her life. On the eve of her 100th birthday, she was honored with the first major retrospective of her work at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art. Nikki talks to LACMA curator Jennifer King about Luchita’s kaleidoscopic life and art. 

See Luchita’s art online at Luchita Hurtado: I Live I Die I Will Be Reborn

Listen to interviews with Luchita online at Made in LA 2018: Luchita Hurtado and Luchita Hurtado: I Live I Die I Will Be Reborn

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
